title: Amazing Animal Friends
overview: This heart warming and fascinating returnable series will bring you the most incredible animal friends from around the world. From a duck that won't enter the water without her Labrador retriever guardian, to a very special friendship between a rhino and a lamb, to an elephant who thinks she's a buffalo. We'll travel the globe to track down the cutest, funniest and most unusual animal relationships and bring you the comical and compelling stories behind these bizarre animal bonds, why they have formed and how they've stood the test of time.
